Uses of Class
tripleplay.ui.bgs.Scale9Background

  • Packages that use Scale9Background 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.ui  
    tripleplay.ui.bgs  

    • Uses of Scale9Background in tripleplay.ui

      Methods in tripleplay.ui that return Scale9Background 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Scale9Background Background.scale9(playn.core.Tile tile)
      Creates a scale9 background with the specified texture tile.

    • Uses of Scale9Background in tripleplay.ui.bgs

      Methods in tripleplay.ui.bgs that return Scale9Background 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Scale9Background Scale9Background.corners(float size)
      Sets all edges of the source axes to the given value.
      Scale9Background Scale9Background.destScale(float scale)
      Sets an overall destination scale for the background.
      Scale9Background Scale9Background.setTint(int tint)
      Sets the tint for this background, as ARGB.
      Scale9Background Scale9Background.xborder(float xborder)
      Sets the width of the left and right edges of the source axes to the given value.
      Scale9Background Scale9Background.yborder(float yborder)
      Sets the height of the top and bottom edges of the source axes to the given value.
